text: Unforgiven (2003) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) for their Raw brand. It took place on September 21, 2003 at the Giant Center in Hershey, Pennsylvania. It was the sixth Unforgiven event held by WWE. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Maven defeated Steven Richards (with Victoria) Singles match 5:13 2 The Dudley Boyz (Bubba Ray and D-Von Dudley) defeated Rob Conway and La Résistance (Sylvain Grenier and René Duprée) (c) Handicap tables match for the World Tag Team Championship 10:17 3 Test (with Stacy Keibler) defeated Scott Steiner Singles match. 6:56 4 Randy Orton (with Ric Flair) defeated Shawn Michaels Singles match 18:47 5 Trish Stratus and Lita defeated Molly Holly and Gail Kim Tag team match 6:34 6 Kane defeated Shane McMahon Last Man Standing match match 19:42 7 Christian (c) defeated Chris Jericho and Rob Van Dam Triple threat match for the WWE Intercontinental Championship 19:03 8 Al Snow and Jonathan Coachman defeated Jim Ross and Jerry Lawler Tag team match for right to be the commentators for Raw 8:16 9 Goldberg defeated Triple H (c) Title vs. Career match for the World Heavyweight Championship 14:57 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Unforgiven 2003 website Category:2003 in professional wrestling Category:2003 in American television Category:2000s in Pennsylvania Category:Sports in Pennsylvania Category:WWE Unforgiven
title: Unforgiven (2003)
